issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: IllegalArgumentException due to missing job submit time

comments.body: I uploaded a patch MAPREDUCE-6259.000.patch, which add submitTime in AMStartedEvent to update JobIndexInfo#submitTime. AMStartedEvent is always called before JobEventType.JOB_INIT is sent.

{color:green}+1 overall{color}.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12704738/MAPREDUCE-6259.000.patch
  against trunk revision 3ff1ba2.

    {color:green}+1 @author{color}.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    {color:green}+1 tests included{color}.  The patch appears to include 1 new or modified test files.

    {color:green}+1 javac{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    {color:green}+1 javadoc{color}.  There were no new javadoc warning messages.

    {color:green}+1 eclipse:eclipse{color}.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    {color:green}+1 findbugs{color}.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

    {color:green}+1 release audit{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    {color:green}+1 core tests{color}.  The patch passed unit tests in hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-core.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/5292//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/5292//console

This message is automatically generated.
Hi [~jlowe], Do you have time to review the patch MAPREDUCE-6259.000.patch? thanks

Apologies for the long delay.

+1 lgtm.  Committing this.
Thanks, [~zxu]!  I committed this to trunk, branch-2, and branch-2.7.

MAPREDUCE-6259. IllegalArgumentException due to missing job submit time. Contributed by zhihai xu (jlowe: rev bf70c5ae2824a9139c1aa9d7c14020018881cec2)

* hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/mapreduce/v2/app/MRAppMaster.java
